name: Disc 11
description: A dedicated open-source music bot for Zhycorp based on Jukebox.

YT_API_KEY.description: YouTube API Key for querying the YouTube API for video data

CONFIG_EMBED_COLOR.description: The color for your bot's embed message

CONFIG_OWNERS.description: A Discord ID(s), use comma if you want to add more than 1 owner (DO NOT ADD SOMEONE ELSE ID THAT YOU DON'T TRUST)

CONFIG_TOTALSHARDS.description: Total shards to spawn, use "auto" or a number (default: auto)

CONFIG_ALLOW_DUPLICATE.description: Whether to allow users to add duplicate of musics (yes or no) (default: no)

CONFIG_DELETE_QUEUE_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in seconds before queue is deleted when no one is in the voice channel (default: 180 <3 minutes>)

CONFIG_CACHE_YOUTUBE_DOWNLOADS.description: Whether to download and cache videos from youtube (yes or no) (default: no)

CONFIG_CACHE_MAX_LENGTH.description: Max music length in seconds that are allowed to cached (default: 5400 <1 hour 30 minutes>)

CONFIG_DISABLE_INVITE_CMD.description: Whether to disable invite command or not (default: no)
